title: Similar to Brandon Grotesque
content:
Hi all,

I'm trying to identify this bold font found in a series of "iconic handbag" illustrations.

The font, I believe, is most similar to is Brandon Grotesque, but this is a little more ornate.

Any help from anyone more knowledgeable on the matter would be most appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193048im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hermes_birkin-640x938_6321.jpg)

Font: 

 Cassannet 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193048/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [iconic\_bags-640x924.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193048/http:/typophile.com/files/iconic_bags-640x924.jpg) | 52.54 KB |
author: thom2000

comments.content:
Looks very similar to: Atipo/Cassannet-Bold
